Posts.Content: Feb 14, 2011 09:42PM beetle25 wrote: Hi Cari-Anne I was neuropenic through all 6 of my chemo treatments with the first two sending me to the hospital once with a serious infection and the second with pneumonia.  I was also housebound the other 4 times feeling extremely fatigued and ill.  I was allowed outside when I felt up to it, just had to avoid contact with people especially those who might be ill, so going places was not a good idea.  I did have the Neulasta shot after each chemo and my white counts still dropped drastically however I was on high dose chemo.
Posts.Title: Neutropenia Cari-Anne beetle25

Posts.Content: Feb 10, 2011 12:13PM beetle25 wrote: Yeah congrats.  That is truly awesome news
